title: Nolte: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez Melts Down over Criticism of Fake Accent
content:
Illegal Immigration 2020 Dems Total Exoneration Free Speech Fight Brexit ‚ÄòMadness‚Äô E.U. Migrant Crime Nolte: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez Melts Down over Criticism of Fake Accent Spencer Platt/Getty Images JOHN NOLTE 6 Apr 2019 Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-NY) responded to criticism for her patronizing use of a fake accent in front of a black audience in the usual manner ‚Äî crybabying. The not-terribly-bright socialist was caught on video Friday patronizing the mostly black audience with a fake southern drawl at Rev. Al Sharpton‚Äôs National Action Network conference.
The humiliating video quickly made the rounds on social media, earning the criticism and ridicule it deserved.
The video is as shocking as it is excruciating. All of a sudden, the Westchester socialist, who is famous for her Jerry the Mouse voice, starts talking like a black preacher.
‚ÄúThis is what organizing looks like. This is what building power looks like,‚Äù Ocasio-Crazy said with her affected cadence. ‚ÄúThis is what changing the country looks like. It‚Äôs when we choose to show up and occupy the room and talk about the things that matter most, talking about our future.‚Äù
‚ÄúAin‚Äôt nothing wrong with that. There‚Äôs nothing wrong with working retail, folding clothes for other people to buy,‚Äù she continued. ‚ÄúThere is nothing wrong with preparing the food that your neighbors will eat. There is nothing wrong with driving the buses that take your family to work‚Äù:
The moment is reminiscent of two-time presidential loser Hillary ‚ÄúHot Sauce‚Äù Clinton‚Äôs similar attempt to condescend to a predominantly black audience with her ‚ÄúAin‚Äôt No Ways Tired‚Äù remarks in 2007:
And let‚Äôs not forget then-Vice President Joe ‚ÄúThe Hair Sniffer‚Äù Biden warning a black audience that Mitt Romney‚Äôs going ‚Äúto put y‚Äôall back in chains‚Äù:
‚ÄúAin‚Äôt.‚Äù
‚ÄúY‚Äôall.‚Äù
More like‚Ä¶
‚ÄúPhony.‚Äù
‚ÄúFreak.‚Äù
Anyway, using the Twitters, Ocasio-CowFart basically melted down over the ridicule, using the absurd argument that this is how Alex from The Block does her thang, and if you were from The Block, you‚Äôd know that‚Äôs how a thang is done, and y‚Äôall need to forget Miss Thang grew up in, ahem, Westchester:
Folks talking about my voice can step right off. Women‚Äôs March & Kavanaugh speech, same.
Any kid who grew up in a distinct linguistic culture & had to learn to navigate class enviros at school/work knows what‚Äôs up.
My Spanish is the same way.
These conspiracy mills are üöÆ. https://t.co/8li33Jd6DL
‚Äî Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (@AOC) April 5, 2019
‚ÄúFolks talking about my voice can step right off,‚Äù she tweeted. ‚ÄúWomen‚Äôs March & Kavanaugh speech, same. Any kid who grew up in a distinct linguistic culture & had to learn to navigate class enviros at school/work knows what‚Äôs up. My Spanish is the same way.‚Äù
What a load of crap.
Even though, at the time, I was younger than she is (she‚Äôs currently 29 going on 14), I managed to live, work, and go to school in Milwaukee‚Äôs inner city for a total of five years. My whole ‚Äúclass enviro‚Äù during those years was predominantly black, but the thought of affecting an accent never even crossed my mind ‚Äî not because I was woke or sensitive, but because I didn‚Äôt want to look like an asshole ‚Äî because this is what Ocasio-Crazy looks like (NSFW):
What‚Äôs more, she‚Äôs lying‚Ä¶
As Ryan Saavedra at the Daily Wire discovered , her claim that this is not the first time she‚Äôs used a ‚Äúdistinct dialect,‚Äù that she did the same during her ‚ÄúWomen‚Äôs March & Kavanaugh speech,‚Äù simply isn‚Äôt true.
Below is video footage of those two speeches, and all you hear is Jerry the Mouse:
In a second tweet, she lied again.
‚ÄúAs much as the right wants to distort & deflect, I am from the Bronx. I act & talk like it, *especially* when I‚Äôm fired up and especially when I‚Äôm home,‚Äù she tweeted.
Except she‚Äôs not from the Bronx. She‚Äôs from Westchester.
‚ÄúIt is so hurtful to see how every aspect of my life is weaponized against me, yet somehow asserted as false at the same time,‚Äù she added, as though it wasn‚Äôt hurtful for us to have to watch her patronize a mostly black audience as though they were babies who require baby talk.
Man, she‚Äôs awful.
Follow John Nolte on Twitter @NolteNC . Follow his Facebook Page here .
Politics Al Sharpton Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez AOC black black accent fake accent Hillary Clinton John Nolte southern accent

title: Report: Amazon Customers Misled by 'Bundled' Reviews
content:
WH Scare Border Battle Antisemitic Omar Assange Trans Military Ban Mayor Pete Pops Off Farage‚Äôs Brexit ‚ÄòRevolution‚Äô Report: Amazon Customers Misled by ‚ÄòBundled‚Äô Reviews Cliff Owen/AP Photo LUCAS NOLAN 6 Apr 2019 According to a recent report, Amazon‚Äôs practice of ‚Äúbundling‚Äù reviews for different products together has resulted in inaccurate ratings of certain products. The Guardian reports that according to a recent analysis, Amazon‚Äôs policy of bundling reviews of different products together has resulted in poor translations of classic books and terrible remakes of Hollywood films to display high star ratings and positive reviews. A study by the Guardian found that many products which have been given one-star ratings appear alongside glowing reviews for other items making it extremely hard for buyers to understand the true quality of the product they‚Äôre attempting to buy.
The Guardian listed just a few examples they found of poor products receiving amazing reviews simply due to this bundling system. The Guardian listed a few of its findings writing:
‚Ä¢ Badly translated or updated Kindle versions of Emma by Jane Austen and Charles Dickens‚Äô Great Expectations , which include references to ‚Äúmoms‚Äù, ‚Äúguys‚Äù and ‚Äúbuddies‚Äù, but appear to have 4.5-star ratings from hundreds of reviewers.
‚Ä¢ A 2017 TV version of Dirty Dancing that shares the 4.5-star reviews of the original film, despite being described by Hollywood Reporter as a ‚Äúbloated‚Äù remake ‚Äúthat nobody asked for and nobody is likely to truly enjoy‚Äù.
‚Ä¢ Reviews for Wuthering Heights appearing under listings for Jane Eyre , and vice versa.
‚Ä¢ Complaints from consumers who said they had been misled when buying books from a variety of authors ‚Äì from JK Rowling to Shakespeare.
‚Ä¢ Star ratings being combined for different products in other departments, from electronics to gardening equipment.
Complaints dating back to 2014 can be found on certain items noting that reviews were appearing under the incorrect editions of certain books. So far, Amazon has declined to comment on this issue.
A Kindle edition of the classic Charles Dickens book Great Expectations, which has a 4.5-star review rating, is reportedly riddled with errors. One review from a reader points this out, writing: ‚ÄúEach page has a dozen errors. It reads as if it has been translated from a foreign language. ‚ÄòDog‚Äô in the original is ‚Äòcanine‚Äô in this version; ‚Äòfile‚Äô in the original has become ‚Äòdocument‚Äô; ‚Äòtremendous‚Äô has become ‚Äòmaximum incredible‚Äô; ‚Äòman‚Äô has become ‚Äòguy‚Äô. That is just a short summary of the errors in the first two pages. The whole thing is unreadable and a waste of money.‚Äù
Natalie Hitchins, the head of home products and services at the consumer group Which? commented on Amazon‚Äôs practices, stating: ‚ÄúIf online retailers are incorrectly grouping customer reviews for different products together, there is a real risk that their customers will be misled.‚Äù She added: ‚ÄúWe need to know we can rely on the information that retailers provide about the products they sell. Online retailers must up their game and ensure reviews are presented in a clear and accurate way.‚Äù
Lucas Nolan is a reporter for Breitbart News covering issues of free speech and online censorship. Follow him on Twitter @LucasNolan or email him at lnolan@breitbart.com
Economy Tech Amazon Jeff Bezos Masters of the Universe

Several migrants, including children, have fainted amid the clouds of tear gas on Saturday. The protesters have lit fires to make the air more bearable, but fires have also erupted from exploding stun grenades.
Greek officials say the migrants have been mobilised by fake news originating on social media and false reports that the road to central Europe, tightly sealed to migrants for three years, is open, and that buses chartered by non-governmental organizations are waiting on the other side of the border with North Macedonia, about 60 kilometres (40 miles) to the north.

title: National Vision Holdings Inc (EYE) CEO L Reade Fahs Sells 35,000 Shares | Daily Political
content:
BCE (BCE) Given New C$66.00 Price Target at Desjardins National Vision Holdings Inc (EYE) CEO L Reade Fahs Sells 35,000 Shares April 6th, 2019 - Comments Off on National Vision Holdings Inc (EYE) CEO L Reade Fahs Sells 35,000 Shares - Filed Under - by Stacy Sanders Tweet
National Vision Holdings Inc (NASDAQ:EYE) CEO L Reade Fahs sold 35,000 shares of the company‚Äôs stock in a transaction that occurred on Wednesday, April 3rd. The shares were sold at an average price of $30.13, for a total value of $1,054,550.00. The transaction was disclosed in a legal filing with the Securities & Exchange Commission, which is available at the SEC website .
L Reade Fahs also recently made the following trade(s): Get National Vision alerts: On Wednesday, March 6th, L Reade Fahs sold 35,000 shares of National Vision stock. The shares were sold at an average price of $31.33, for a total value of $1,096,550.00. On Wednesday, February 6th, L Reade Fahs sold 35,000 shares of National Vision stock. The shares were sold at an average price of $31.64, for a total value of $1,107,400.00. On Friday, January 11th, L Reade Fahs sold 25,000 shares of National Vision stock. The shares were sold at an average price of $30.00, for a total value of $750,000.00.
EYE stock traded down $0.11 during midday trading on Friday, reaching $30.40. 511,531 shares of the company‚Äôs stock traded hands, compared to its average volume of 676,996. The company has a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.77, a current ratio of 1.01 and a quick ratio of 0.47. National Vision Holdings Inc has a 52 week low of $25.60 and a 52 week high of $46.63. The stock has a market capitalization of $2.39 billion, a price-to-earnings ratio of 67.56, a PEG ratio of 2.94 and a beta of 1.83. National Vision (NASDAQ:EYE) last issued its earnings results on Wednesday, February 27th. The company reported ($0.06) earnings per share (EPS) for the quarter, meeting analysts‚Äô consensus estimates of ($0.06). National Vision had a net margin of 1.66% and a return on equity of 6.75%. The business had revenue of $355.92 million for the quarter, compared to analysts‚Äô expectations of $350.14 million. During the same quarter in the previous year, the firm posted $0.39 EPS. The business‚Äôs revenue for the quarter was up 10.6% compared to the same quarter last year. Equities research analysts anticipate that National Vision Holdings Inc will post 0.56 EPS for the current year.
Several equities analysts recently commented on EYE shares. ValuEngine downgraded National Vision from a ‚Äústrong-buy‚Äù rating to a ‚Äúbuy‚Äù rating in a research note on Friday, December 7th. Zacks Investment Research upgraded National Vision from a ‚Äúsell‚Äù rating to a ‚Äúhold‚Äù rating in a research note on Monday, January 14th. One analyst has rated the stock with a sell rating, three have issued a hold rating and six have given a buy rating to the stock. National Vision currently has a consensus rating of ‚ÄúBuy‚Äù and an average price target of $48.13.
A number of hedge funds have recently modified their holdings of the business. OMERS ADMINISTRATION Corp bought a new stake in National Vision during the 4th quarter valued at $1,386,000. Geode Capital Management LLC raised its holdings in National Vision by 36.8% during the 4th quarter. Geode Capital Management LLC now owns 714,909 shares of the company‚Äôs stock valued at $20,138,000 after acquiring an additional 192,289 shares during the period. Norges Bank bought a new stake in National Vision during the 4th quarter valued at $13,620,000. Dimensional Fund Advisors LP raised its holdings in National Vision by 78.7% during the 4th quarter. Dimensional Fund Advisors LP now owns 319,311 shares of the company‚Äôs stock valued at $8,997,000 after acquiring an additional 140,578 shares during the period. Finally, Amalgamated Bank bought a new position in shares of National Vision in the fourth quarter worth $257,000.

National Vision Company Profile
National Vision Holdings, Inc, through its subsidiaries, operates as an optical retailer primarily in the United States. The company operates in two segments, Owned & Host and Legacy. It offers eyeglasses and contact lenses, and optical accessory products, as well as eye exams through its America's Best, Eyeglass World, Vista Optical, and Vista Optical Military, as well as Vision Center brand stores; and provides health maintenance organization, vision care benefit plan, and optometric services. title: Man Flees Sweden for Poland with Daughters Put in Muslim Foster Care
content:
"Denis Lisov came to Sweden seven years ago. content:

Dear Reader, As you can imagine, more people are reading The Jerusalem Post than ever before. Nevertheless, traditional business models are no longer sustainable and high-quality publications, like ours, are being forced to look for new ways to keep going. Thank you,
Ronit Hasin-Hochman, CEO, Jerusalem Post Group Yaakov Katz, Editor-in-Chief UPGRADE YOUR JPOST EXPERIENCE FOR 5$ PER MONTH Show me later
Eastern Libyan commander Khalifa Haftar must listen to warnings from the international community to halt his advance on Tripoli or else it will have to see what needs to be done, Italy's foreign minister said on Saturday. "We have stated quite clearly what our position is," Enzo Milanesi told reporters after a G7 meeting of foreign ministers in western France."We very much hope that he will take it into consideration. If this does not happen, we will see what can be done," he said.
